2525  @Test
2526  public void testCheckAndMutateWithNonEqualCompareOp() throws IOException {
2527    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
2528    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
2529    byte[] qf1 = Bytes.toBytes("qualifier");
2530    byte[] val1 = Bytes.toBytes("value1");
2531    byte[] val2 = Bytes.toBytes("value2");
2532    byte[] val3 = Bytes.toBytes("value3");
2533    byte[] val4 = Bytes.toBytes("value4");
2534
2535    // Setting up region
2536    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
2537    // Putting val3 in key
2538    Put put = new Put(row1);
2539    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val3);
2540    region.put(put);
2541
2542    // Test CompareOp.LESS: original = val3, compare with val3, fail
2543    CheckAndMutateResult res = region.checkAndMutate(
2544      CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1).ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.LESS, val3).build(put));
2545    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2546    assertNull(res.getResult());
2547
2548    // Test CompareOp.LESS: original = val3, compare with val4, fail
2549    res = region.checkAndMutate(
2550      CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1).ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.LESS, val4).build(put));
2551    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2552    assertNull(res.getResult());
2553
2554    // Test CompareOp.LESS: original = val3, compare with val2,
2555    // succeed (now value = val2)
2556    put = new Put(row1);
2557    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val2);
2558    res = region.checkAndMutate(
2559      CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1).ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.LESS, val2).build(put));
2560    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2561    assertNull(res.getResult());
2562
2563    // Test CompareOp.LESS_OR_EQUAL: original = val2, compare with val3, fail
2564    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2565      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.LESS_OR_EQUAL, val3).build(put));
2566    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2567    assertNull(res.getResult());
2568
2569    // Test CompareOp.LESS_OR_EQUAL: original = val2, compare with val2,
2570    // succeed (value still = val2)
2571    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2572      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.LESS_OR_EQUAL, val2).build(put));
2573    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2574    assertNull(res.getResult());
2575
2576    // Test CompareOp.LESS_OR_EQUAL: original = val2, compare with val1,
2577    // succeed (now value = val3)
2578    put = new Put(row1);
2579    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val3);
2580    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2581      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.LESS_OR_EQUAL, val1).build(put));
2582    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2583    assertNull(res.getResult());
2584
2585    // Test CompareOp.GREATER: original = val3, compare with val3, fail
2586    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2587      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.GREATER, val3).build(put));
2588    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2589    assertNull(res.getResult());
2590
2591    // Test CompareOp.GREATER: original = val3, compare with val2, fail
2592    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2593      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.GREATER, val2).build(put));
2594    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2595    assertNull(res.getResult());
2596
2597    // Test CompareOp.GREATER: original = val3, compare with val4,
2598    // succeed (now value = val2)
2599    put = new Put(row1);
2600    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val2);
2601    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2602      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.GREATER, val4).build(put));
2603    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2604    assertNull(res.getResult());
2605
2606    // Test CompareOp.GREATER_OR_EQUAL: original = val2, compare with val1, fail
2607    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2608      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.GREATER_OR_EQUAL, val1).build(put));
2609    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2610    assertNull(res.getResult());
2611
2612    // Test CompareOp.GREATER_OR_EQUAL: original = val2, compare with val2,
2613    // succeed (value still = val2)
2614    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2615      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.GREATER_OR_EQUAL, val2).build(put));
2616    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2617    assertNull(res.getResult());
2618
2619    // Test CompareOp.GREATER_OR_EQUAL: original = val2, compare with val3, succeed
2620    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2621      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.GREATER_OR_EQUAL, val3).build(put));
2622    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2623    assertNull(res.getResult());
2624  }

2626  @Test
2627  public void testCheckAndPutThatPutWasWritten() throws IOException {
2628    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
2629    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
2630    byte[] fam2 = Bytes.toBytes("fam2");
2631    byte[] qf1 = Bytes.toBytes("qualifier");
2632    byte[] val1 = Bytes.toBytes("value1");
2633    byte[] val2 = Bytes.toBytes("value2");
2634
2635    byte[][] families = { fam1, fam2 };
2636
2637    // Setting up region
2638    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
2639    // Putting data in the key to check
2640    Put put = new Put(row1);
2641    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val1);
2642    region.put(put);
2643
2644    // Creating put to add
2645    long ts = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime();
2646    KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(row1, fam2, qf1, ts, KeyValue.Type.Put, val2);
2647    put = new Put(row1);
2648    put.add(kv);
2649
2650    // checkAndPut with wrong value
2651    CheckAndMutateResult res = region.checkAndMutate(
2652      CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1).ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.EQUAL, val1).build(put));
2653    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2654    assertNull(res.getResult());
2655
2656    Get get = new Get(row1);
2657    get.addColumn(fam2, qf1);
2658    Cell[] actual = region.get(get).rawCells();
2659
2660    Cell[] expected = { kv };
2661
2662    assertEquals(expected.length, actual.length);
2663    for (int i = 0; i < actual.length; i++) {
2664      assertEquals(expected[i], actual[i]);
2665    }
2666  }

2668  @Test
2669  public void testCheckAndDeleteThatDeleteWasWritten() throws IOException {
2670    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
2671    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
2672    byte[] fam2 = Bytes.toBytes("fam2");
2673    byte[] qf1 = Bytes.toBytes("qualifier1");
2674    byte[] qf2 = Bytes.toBytes("qualifier2");
2675    byte[] qf3 = Bytes.toBytes("qualifier3");
2676    byte[] val1 = Bytes.toBytes("value1");
2677    byte[] val2 = Bytes.toBytes("value2");
2678    byte[] val3 = Bytes.toBytes("value3");
2679    byte[] emptyVal = new byte[] {};
2680
2681    byte[][] families = { fam1, fam2 };
2682
2683    // Setting up region
2684    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
2685    // Put content
2686    Put put = new Put(row1);
2687    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val1);
2688    region.put(put);
2689    Threads.sleep(2);
2690
2691    put = new Put(row1);
2692    put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, val2);
2693    put.addColumn(fam2, qf1, val3);
2694    put.addColumn(fam2, qf2, val2);
2695    put.addColumn(fam2, qf3, val1);
2696    put.addColumn(fam1, qf3, val1);
2697    region.put(put);
2698
2699    LOG.info("get={}", region.get(new Get(row1).addColumn(fam1, qf1)).toString());
2700
2701    // Multi-column delete
2702    Delete delete = new Delete(row1);
2703    delete.addColumn(fam1, qf1);
2704    delete.addColumn(fam2, qf1);
2705    delete.addColumn(fam1, qf3);
2706    CheckAndMutateResult res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2707      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.EQUAL, val2).build(delete));
2708    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2709    assertNull(res.getResult());
2710
2711    Get get = new Get(row1);
2712    get.addColumn(fam1, qf1);
2713    get.addColumn(fam1, qf3);
2714    get.addColumn(fam2, qf2);
2715    Result r = region.get(get);
2716    assertEquals(2, r.size());
2717    assertArrayEquals(val1, r.getValue(fam1, qf1));
2718    assertArrayEquals(val2, r.getValue(fam2, qf2));
2719
2720    // Family delete
2721    delete = new Delete(row1);
2722    delete.addFamily(fam2);
2723    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2724      .ifMatches(fam2, qf1, CompareOperator.EQUAL, emptyVal).build(delete));
2725    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2726    assertNull(res.getResult());
2727
2728    get = new Get(row1);
2729    r = region.get(get);
2730    assertEquals(1, r.size());
2731    assertArrayEquals(val1, r.getValue(fam1, qf1));
2732
2733    // Row delete
2734    delete = new Delete(row1);
2735    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row1)
2736      .ifMatches(fam1, qf1, CompareOperator.EQUAL, val1).build(delete));
2737    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2738    assertNull(res.getResult());
2739
2740    get = new Get(row1);
2741    r = region.get(get);
2742    assertEquals(0, r.size());
2743  }

2745  @Test
2746  public void testCheckAndMutateWithFilters() throws Throwable {
2747    final byte[] FAMILY = Bytes.toBytes("fam");
2748
2749    // Setting up region
2750    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, FAMILY);
2751
2752    // Put one row
2753    Put put = new Put(row);
2754    put.addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("a"));
2755    put.addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), Bytes.toBytes("b"));
2756    put.addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("C"), Bytes.toBytes("c"));
2757    region.put(put);
2758
2759    // Put with success
2760    CheckAndMutateResult res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2761      .ifMatches(new FilterList(
2762        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2763          Bytes.toBytes("a")),
2764        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2765          Bytes.toBytes("b"))))
2766      .build(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D"), Bytes.toBytes("d"))));
2767    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2768    assertNull(res.getResult());
2769
2770    Result result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D")));
2771    assertEquals("d", Bytes.toString(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D"))));
2772
2773    // Put with failure
2774    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2775      .ifMatches(new FilterList(
2776        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2777          Bytes.toBytes("a")),
2778        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2779          Bytes.toBytes("c"))))
2780      .build(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("E"), Bytes.toBytes("e"))));
2781    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2782    assertNull(res.getResult());
2783
2784    assertTrue(region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("E"))).isEmpty());
2785
2786    // Delete with success
2787    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2788      .ifMatches(new FilterList(
2789        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2790          Bytes.toBytes("a")),
2791        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2792          Bytes.toBytes("b"))))
2793      .build(new Delete(row).addColumns(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D"))));
2794    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2795    assertNull(res.getResult());
2796
2797    assertTrue(region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D"))).isEmpty());
2798
2799    // Mutate with success
2800    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2801      .ifMatches(new FilterList(
2802        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2803          Bytes.toBytes("a")),
2804        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2805          Bytes.toBytes("b"))))
2806      .build(new RowMutations(row)
2807        .add((Mutation) new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("E"), Bytes.toBytes("e")))
2808        .add((Mutation) new Delete(row).addColumns(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A")))));
2809    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2810    assertNull(res.getResult());
2811
2812    result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("E")));
2813    assertEquals("e", Bytes.toString(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("E"))));
2814
2815    assertTrue(region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"))).isEmpty());
2816  }

2818  @Test
2819  public void testCheckAndMutateWithFiltersAndTimeRange() throws Throwable {
2820    final byte[] FAMILY = Bytes.toBytes("fam");
2821
2822    // Setting up region
2823    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, FAMILY);
2824
2825    // Put with specifying the timestamp
2826    region.put(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), 100, Bytes.toBytes("a")));
2827
2828    // Put with success
2829    CheckAndMutateResult res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2830      .ifMatches(new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2831        Bytes.toBytes("a")))
2832      .timeRange(TimeRange.between(0, 101))
2833      .build(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), Bytes.toBytes("b"))));
2834    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2835    assertNull(res.getResult());
2836
2837    Result result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B")));
2838    assertEquals("b", Bytes.toString(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2839
2840    // Put with failure
2841    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2842      .ifMatches(new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2843        Bytes.toBytes("a")))
2844      .timeRange(TimeRange.between(0, 100))
2845      .build(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("C"), Bytes.toBytes("c"))));
2846    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2847    assertNull(res.getResult());
2848
2849    assertTrue(region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("C"))).isEmpty());
2850
2851    // RowMutations with success
2852    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2853      .ifMatches(new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2854        Bytes.toBytes("a")))
2855      .timeRange(TimeRange.between(0, 101))
2856      .build(new RowMutations(row)
2857        .add((Mutation) new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D"), Bytes.toBytes("d")))
2858        .add((Mutation) new Delete(row).addColumns(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A")))));
2859    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2860    assertNull(res.getResult());
2861
2862    result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D")));
2863    assertEquals("d", Bytes.toString(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("D"))));
2864
2865    assertTrue(region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"))).isEmpty());
2866  }

2868  @Test
2869  public void testCheckAndIncrement() throws Throwable {
2870    final byte[] FAMILY = Bytes.toBytes("fam");
2871
2872    // Setting up region
2873    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, FAMILY);
2874
2875    region.put(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("a")));
2876
2877    // CheckAndIncrement with correct value
2878    CheckAndMutateResult res = region.checkAndMutate(
2879      CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifEquals(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("a"))
2880        .build(new Increment(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), 1)));
2881    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2882    assertEquals(1, Bytes.toLong(res.getResult().getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2883
2884    Result result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B")));
2885    assertEquals(1, Bytes.toLong(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2886
2887    // CheckAndIncrement with wrong value
2888    res = region.checkAndMutate(
2889      CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifEquals(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), Bytes.toBytes("b"))
2890        .build(new Increment(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), 1)));
2891    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2892    assertNull(res.getResult());
2893
2894    result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B")));
2895    assertEquals(1, Bytes.toLong(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2896
2897    region.put(new Put(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("C"), Bytes.toBytes("c")));
2898
2899    // CheckAndIncrement with a filter and correct value
2900    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2901      .ifMatches(new FilterList(
2902        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2903          Bytes.toBytes("a")),
2904        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("C"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2905          Bytes.toBytes("c"))))
2906      .build(new Increment(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), 2)));
2907    assertTrue(res.isSuccess());
2908    assertEquals(3, Bytes.toLong(res.getResult().getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2909
2910    result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B")));
2911    assertEquals(3, Bytes.toLong(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2912
2913    // CheckAndIncrement with a filter and correct value
2914    res = region.checkAndMutate(CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row)
2915      .ifMatches(new FilterList(
2916        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("A"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2917          Bytes.toBytes("b")),
2918        new SingleColumnValueFilter(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("C"), CompareOperator.EQUAL,
2919          Bytes.toBytes("d"))))
2920      .build(new Increment(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"), 2)));
2921    assertFalse(res.isSuccess());
2922    assertNull(res.getResult());
2923
2924    result = region.get(new Get(row).addColumn(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B")));
2925    assertEquals(3, Bytes.toLong(result.getValue(FAMILY, Bytes.toBytes("B"))));
2926  }

2988  @Test
2989  public void testCheckAndIncrementAndAppend() throws Throwable {
2990    // Setting up region
2991    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
2992
2993    // CheckAndMutate with Increment and Append
2994    CheckAndMutate checkAndMutate = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifNotExists(fam1, qual)
2995      .build(new RowMutations(row).add((Mutation) new Increment(row).addColumn(fam1, qual1, 1L))
2996        .add((Mutation) new Append(row).addColumn(fam1, qual2, Bytes.toBytes("a"))));
2997
2998    CheckAndMutateResult result = region.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutate);
2999    assertTrue(result.isSuccess());
3000    assertEquals(1L, Bytes.toLong(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, qual1)));
3001    assertEquals("a", Bytes.toString(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, qual2)));
3002
3003    Result r = region.get(new Get(row));
3004    assertEquals(1L, Bytes.toLong(r.getValue(fam1, qual1)));
3005    assertEquals("a", Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, qual2)));
3006
3007    // Set return results to false
3008    checkAndMutate = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifNotExists(fam1, qual)
3009      .build(new RowMutations(row)
3010        .add((Mutation) new Increment(row).addColumn(fam1, qual1, 1L).setReturnResults(false))
3011        .add((Mutation) new Append(row).addColumn(fam1, qual2, Bytes.toBytes("a"))
3012          .setReturnResults(false)));
3013
3014    result = region.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutate);
3015    assertTrue(result.isSuccess());
3016    assertNull(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, qual1));
3017    assertNull(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, qual2));
3018
3019    r = region.get(new Get(row));
3020    assertEquals(2L, Bytes.toLong(r.getValue(fam1, qual1)));
3021    assertEquals("aa", Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, qual2)));
3022
3023    checkAndMutate = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifNotExists(fam1, qual)
3024      .build(new RowMutations(row).add((Mutation) new Increment(row).addColumn(fam1, qual1, 1L))
3025        .add((Mutation) new Append(row).addColumn(fam1, qual2, Bytes.toBytes("a"))
3026          .setReturnResults(false)));
3027
3028    result = region.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutate);
3029    assertTrue(result.isSuccess());
3030    assertEquals(3L, Bytes.toLong(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, qual1)));
3031    assertNull(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, qual2));
3032
3033    r = region.get(new Get(row));
3034    assertEquals(3L, Bytes.toLong(r.getValue(fam1, qual1)));
3035    assertEquals("aaa", Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, qual2)));
3036  }

3038  @Test
3039  public void testCheckAndRowMutations() throws Throwable {
3040    final byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("row");
3041    final byte[] q1 = Bytes.toBytes("q1");
3042    final byte[] q2 = Bytes.toBytes("q2");
3043    final byte[] q3 = Bytes.toBytes("q3");
3044    final byte[] q4 = Bytes.toBytes("q4");
3045    final String v1 = "v1";
3046
3047    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
3048
3049    // Initial values
3050    region
3051      .batchMutate(new Mutation[] { new Put(row).addColumn(fam1, q2, Bytes.toBytes("toBeDeleted")),
3052        new Put(row).addColumn(fam1, q3, Bytes.toBytes(5L)),
3053        new Put(row).addColumn(fam1, q4, Bytes.toBytes("a")), });
3054
3055    // Do CheckAndRowMutations
3056    CheckAndMutate checkAndMutate = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifNotExists(fam1, q1).build(
3057      new RowMutations(row).add(Arrays.asList(new Put(row).addColumn(fam1, q1, Bytes.toBytes(v1)),
3058        new Delete(row).addColumns(fam1, q2), new Increment(row).addColumn(fam1, q3, 1),
3059        new Append(row).addColumn(fam1, q4, Bytes.toBytes("b")))));
3060
3061    CheckAndMutateResult result = region.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutate);
3062    assertTrue(result.isSuccess());
3063    assertEquals(6L, Bytes.toLong(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, q3)));
3064    assertEquals("ab", Bytes.toString(result.getResult().getValue(fam1, q4)));
3065
3066    // Verify the value
3067    Result r = region.get(new Get(row));
3068    assertEquals(v1, Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, q1)));
3069    assertNull(r.getValue(fam1, q2));
3070    assertEquals(6L, Bytes.toLong(r.getValue(fam1, q3)));
3071    assertEquals("ab", Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, q4)));
3072
3073    // Do CheckAndRowMutations again
3074    checkAndMutate = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row).ifNotExists(fam1, q1)
3075      .build(new RowMutations(row).add(Arrays.asList(new Delete(row).addColumns(fam1, q1),
3076        new Put(row).addColumn(fam1, q2, Bytes.toBytes(v1)),
3077        new Increment(row).addColumn(fam1, q3, 1),
3078        new Append(row).addColumn(fam1, q4, Bytes.toBytes("b")))));
3079
3080    result = region.checkAndMutate(checkAndMutate);
3081    assertFalse(result.isSuccess());
3082    assertNull(result.getResult());
3083
3084    // Verify the value
3085    r = region.get(new Get(row));
3086    assertEquals(v1, Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, q1)));
3087    assertNull(r.getValue(fam1, q2));
3088    assertEquals(6L, Bytes.toLong(r.getValue(fam1, q3)));
3089    assertEquals("ab", Bytes.toString(r.getValue(fam1, q4)));
3090  }

3095  @Test
3096  public void testDelete_multiDeleteColumn() throws IOException {
3097    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3098    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
3099    byte[] qual = Bytes.toBytes("qualifier");
3100    byte[] value = Bytes.toBytes("value");
3101
3102    Put put = new Put(row1);
3103    put.addColumn(fam1, qual, 1, value);
3104    put.addColumn(fam1, qual, 2, value);
3105
3106    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
3107    region.put(put);
3108
3109    // We do support deleting more than 1 'latest' version
3110    Delete delete = new Delete(row1);
3111    delete.addColumn(fam1, qual);
3112    delete.addColumn(fam1, qual);
3113    region.delete(delete);
3114
3115    Get get = new Get(row1);
3116    get.addFamily(fam1);
3117    Result r = region.get(get);
3118    assertEquals(0, r.size());
3119  }

3121  @Test
3122  public void testDelete_CheckFamily() throws IOException {
3123    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3124    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
3125    byte[] fam2 = Bytes.toBytes("fam2");
3126    byte[] fam3 = Bytes.toBytes("fam3");
3127    byte[] fam4 = Bytes.toBytes("fam4");
3128
3129    // Setting up region
3130    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1, fam2, fam3);
3131    List<Cell> kvs = new ArrayList<>();
3132    kvs.add(new KeyValue(row1, fam4, null, null));
3133
3134    byte[] forUnitTestsOnly = Bytes.toBytes("ForUnitTestsOnly");
3135
3136    // testing existing family
3137    NavigableMap<byte[], List<Cell>> deleteMap = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
3138    deleteMap.put(fam2, kvs);
3139    region.delete(new Delete(forUnitTestsOnly, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, deleteMap));
3140
3141    // testing non existing family
3142    NavigableMap<byte[], List<Cell>> deleteMap2 = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
3143    deleteMap2.put(fam4, kvs);
3144    assertThrows("Family " + Bytes.toString(fam4) + " does exist",
3145      NoSuchColumnFamilyException.class,
3146      () -> region.delete(new Delete(forUnitTestsOnly, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, deleteMap2)));
3147  }

3149  @Test
3150  public void testDelete_mixed() throws IOException, InterruptedException {
3151    byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
3152    byte[][] families = { fam };
3153    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3154    EnvironmentEdgeManagerTestHelper.injectEdge(new IncrementingEnvironmentEdge());
3155
3156    byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("table_name");
3157    // column names
3158    byte[] serverinfo = Bytes.toBytes("serverinfo");
3159    byte[] splitA = Bytes.toBytes("splitA");
3160    byte[] splitB = Bytes.toBytes("splitB");
3161
3162    // add some data:
3163    Put put = new Put(row);
3164    put.addColumn(fam, splitA, Bytes.toBytes("reference_A"));
3165    region.put(put);
3166
3167    put = new Put(row);
3168    put.addColumn(fam, splitB, Bytes.toBytes("reference_B"));
3169    region.put(put);
3170
3171    put = new Put(row);
3172    put.addColumn(fam, serverinfo, Bytes.toBytes("ip_address"));
3173    region.put(put);
3174
3175    // ok now delete a split:
3176    Delete delete = new Delete(row);
3177    delete.addColumns(fam, splitA);
3178    region.delete(delete);
3179
3180    // assert some things:
3181    Get get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, serverinfo);
3182    Result result = region.get(get);
3183    assertEquals(1, result.size());
3184
3185    get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, splitA);
3186    result = region.get(get);
3187    assertEquals(0, result.size());
3188
3189    get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, splitB);
3190    result = region.get(get);
3191    assertEquals(1, result.size());
3192
3193    // Assert that after a delete, I can put.
3194    put = new Put(row);
3195    put.addColumn(fam, splitA, Bytes.toBytes("reference_A"));
3196    region.put(put);
3197    get = new Get(row);
3198    result = region.get(get);
3199    assertEquals(3, result.size());
3200
3201    // Now delete all... then test I can add stuff back
3202    delete = new Delete(row);
3203    region.delete(delete);
3204    assertEquals(0, region.get(get).size());
3205
3206    region.put(new Put(row).addColumn(fam, splitA, Bytes.toBytes("reference_A")));
3207    result = region.get(get);
3208    assertEquals(1, result.size());
3209  }

3211  @Test
3212  public void testDeleteRowWithFutureTs() throws IOException {
3213    byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
3214    byte[][] families = { fam };
3215    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3216    byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("table_name");
3217    // column names
3218    byte[] serverinfo = Bytes.toBytes("serverinfo");
3219
3220    // add data in the far future
3221    Put put = new Put(row);
3222    put.addColumn(fam, serverinfo, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP - 5, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
3223    region.put(put);
3224
3225    // now delete something in the present
3226    Delete delete = new Delete(row);
3227    region.delete(delete);
3228
3229    // make sure we still see our data
3230    Get get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, serverinfo);
3231    Result result = region.get(get);
3232    assertEquals(1, result.size());
3233
3234    // delete the future row
3235    delete = new Delete(row, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP - 3);
3236    region.delete(delete);
3237
3238    // make sure it is gone
3239    get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, serverinfo);
3240    result = region.get(get);
3241    assertEquals(0, result.size());
3242  }

3244  /**
3245   * Tests that the special LATEST_TIMESTAMP option for puts gets replaced by the actual timestamp
3246   */
3247  @Test
3248  public void testPutWithLatestTS() throws IOException {
3249    byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
3250    byte[][] families = { fam };
3251    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3252    byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3253    // column names
3254    byte[] qual = Bytes.toBytes("qual");
3255
3256    // add data with LATEST_TIMESTAMP, put without WAL
3257    Put put = new Put(row);
3258    put.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
3259    region.put(put);
3260
3261    // Make sure it shows up with an actual timestamp
3262    Get get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, qual);
3263    Result result = region.get(get);
3264    assertEquals(1, result.size());
3265    Cell kv = result.rawCells()[0];
3266    LOG.info("Got: " + kv);
3267    assertTrue("LATEST_TIMESTAMP was not replaced with real timestamp",
3268      kv.getTimestamp() != HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP);
3269
3270    // Check same with WAL enabled (historically these took different
3271    // code paths, so check both)
3272    row = Bytes.toBytes("row2");
3273    put = new Put(row);
3274    put.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
3275    region.put(put);
3276
3277    // Make sure it shows up with an actual timestamp
3278    get = new Get(row).addColumn(fam, qual);
3279    result = region.get(get);
3280    assertEquals(1, result.size());
3281    kv = result.rawCells()[0];
3282    LOG.info("Got: " + kv);
3283    assertTrue("LATEST_TIMESTAMP was not replaced with real timestamp",
3284      kv.getTimestamp() != HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP);
3285  }

3287  /**
3288   * Tests that there is server-side filtering for invalid timestamp upper bound. Note that the
3289   * timestamp lower bound is automatically handled for us by the TTL field.
3290   */
3291  @Test
3292  public void testPutWithTsSlop() throws IOException {
3293    byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
3294    byte[][] families = { fam };
3295
3296    // add data with a timestamp that is too recent for range. Ensure assert
3297    CONF.setInt("hbase.hregion.keyvalue.timestamp.slop.millisecs", 1000);
3298    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3299    boolean caughtExcep = false;
3300    try {
3301      // no TS specified == use latest. should not error
3302      region.put(new Put(row).addColumn(fam, Bytes.toBytes("qual"), Bytes.toBytes("value")));
3303      // TS out of range. should error
3304      region.put(new Put(row).addColumn(fam, Bytes.toBytes("qual"),
3305        EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime() + 2000, Bytes.toBytes("value")));
3306      fail("Expected IOE for TS out of configured timerange");
3307    } catch (FailedSanityCheckException ioe) {
3308      LOG.debug("Received expected exception", ioe);
3309      caughtExcep = true;
3310    }
3311    assertTrue("Should catch FailedSanityCheckException", caughtExcep);
3312  }

3352  @Test
3353  public void testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL() throws IOException {
3354    FileSystem fs = FileSystem.get(CONF);
3355    Path rootDir = new Path(dir + "testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL");
3356    FSHLog hLog = new FSHLog(fs, rootDir, "testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL", CONF);
3357    hLog.init();
3358    // This chunk creation is done throughout the code base. Do we want to move it into core?
3359    // It is missing from this test. W/o it we NPE.
3360    region = initHRegion(tableName, null, null, CONF, false, Durability.SYNC_WAL, hLog,
3361      COLUMN_FAMILY_BYTES);
3362
3363    Cell originalCell = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY).setRow(row)
3364      .setFamily(COLUMN_FAMILY_BYTES).setQualifier(qual1)
3365      .setTimestamp(EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime()).setType(KeyValue.Type.Put.getCode())
3366      .setValue(value1).build();
3367    final long originalSize = originalCell.getSerializedSize();
3368
3369    Cell addCell = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY).setRow(row)
3370      .setFamily(COLUMN_FAMILY_BYTES).setQualifier(qual1)
3371      .setTimestamp(EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime()).setType(KeyValue.Type.Put.getCode())
3372      .setValue(Bytes.toBytes("xxxxxxxxxx")).build();
3373    final long addSize = addCell.getSerializedSize();
3374
3375    LOG.info("originalSize:" + originalSize + ", addSize:" + addSize);
3376    // start test. We expect that the addPut's durability will be replaced
3377    // by originalPut's durability.
3378
3379    // case 1:
3380    testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL(region,
3381      new Put(row).add(originalCell).setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL),
3382      new Put(row).add(addCell).setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL), originalSize + addSize);
3383
3384    // case 2:
3385    testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL(region,
3386      new Put(row).add(originalCell).setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL),
3387      new Put(row).add(addCell).setDurability(Durability.SYNC_WAL), originalSize + addSize);
3388
3389    // case 3:
3390    testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL(region,
3391      new Put(row).add(originalCell).setDurability(Durability.SYNC_WAL),
3392      new Put(row).add(addCell).setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL), 0);
3393
3394    // case 4:
3395    testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL(region,
3396      new Put(row).add(originalCell).setDurability(Durability.SYNC_WAL),
3397      new Put(row).add(addCell).setDurability(Durability.SYNC_WAL), 0);
3398  }
3399
3400  private static void testDataInMemoryWithoutWAL(HRegion region, Put originalPut, final Put addPut,
3401    long delta) throws IOException {
3402    final long initSize = region.getDataInMemoryWithoutWAL();
3403    // save normalCPHost and replaced by mockedCPHost
3404    RegionCoprocessorHost normalCPHost = region.getCoprocessorHost();
3405    RegionCoprocessorHost mockedCPHost = mock(RegionCoprocessorHost.class);
3406    // Because the preBatchMutate returns void, we can't do usual Mockito when...then form. Must
3407    // do below format (from Mockito doc).
3408    doAnswer(new Answer<Void>() {
3409      @Override
3410      public Void answer(InvocationOnMock invocation) throws Throwable {
3411        MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> mb = invocation.getArgument(0);
3412        mb.addOperationsFromCP(0, new Mutation[] { addPut });
3413        return null;
3414      }
3415    }).when(mockedCPHost).preBatchMutate(isA(MiniBatchOperationInProgress.class));
3416    ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder builder =
3417      ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(COLUMN_FAMILY_BYTES);
3418    ScanInfo info = new ScanInfo(CONF, builder.build(), Long.MAX_VALUE, Long.MAX_VALUE,
3419      region.getCellComparator());
3420    when(mockedCPHost.preFlushScannerOpen(any(HStore.class), any())).thenReturn(info);
3421
3422    when(mockedCPHost.preFlush(any(), any(StoreScanner.class), any()))
3423      .thenAnswer(i -> i.getArgument(1));
3424    region.setCoprocessorHost(mockedCPHost);
3425
3426    region.put(originalPut);
3427    region.setCoprocessorHost(normalCPHost);
3428    final long finalSize = region.getDataInMemoryWithoutWAL();
3429    assertEquals("finalSize:" + finalSize + ", initSize:" + initSize + ", delta:" + delta,
3430      finalSize, initSize + delta);
3431  }

3440  @Test
3441  public void testaddFamily_PostInsert() throws IOException, InterruptedException {

3446
3447  public void doTestDelete_AndPostInsert(Delete delete) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
3448    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
3449    EnvironmentEdgeManagerTestHelper.injectEdge(new IncrementingEnvironmentEdge());
3450    Put put = new Put(row);
3451    put.addColumn(fam1, qual1, value1);
3452    region.put(put);
3453
3454    // now delete the value:
3455    region.delete(delete);
3456
3457    // ok put data:
3458    put = new Put(row);
3459    put.addColumn(fam1, qual1, value2);
3460    region.put(put);
3461
3462    // ok get:
3463    Get get = new Get(row);
3464    get.addColumn(fam1, qual1);
3465
3466    Result r = region.get(get);
3467    assertEquals(1, r.size());
3468    assertArrayEquals(value2, r.getValue(fam1, qual1));
3469
3470    // next:
3471    Scan scan = new Scan().withStartRow(row);
3472    scan.addColumn(fam1, qual1);
3473    try (InternalScanner s = region.getScanner(scan)) {
3474      List<Cell> results = new ArrayList<>();
3475      assertEquals(false, s.next(results));
3476      assertEquals(1, results.size());
3477      Cell kv = results.get(0);
3478
3479      assertArrayEquals(value2, CellUtil.cloneValue(kv));
3480      assertArrayEquals(fam1, CellUtil.cloneFamily(kv));
3481      assertArrayEquals(qual1, CellUtil.cloneQualifier(kv));
3482      assertArrayEquals(row, CellUtil.cloneRow(kv));
3483    }
3484  }

3486  @Test
3487  public void testDelete_CheckTimestampUpdated() throws IOException {
3488    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3489    byte[] col1 = Bytes.toBytes("col1");
3490    byte[] col2 = Bytes.toBytes("col2");
3491    byte[] col3 = Bytes.toBytes("col3");
3492
3493    byte[] forUnitTestsOnly = Bytes.toBytes("ForUnitTestsOnly");
3494
3495    // Setting up region
3496    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
3497    // Building checkerList
3498    List<Cell> kvs = new ArrayList<>();
3499    kvs.add(new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col1, null));
3500    kvs.add(new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col2, null));
3501    kvs.add(new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col3, null));
3502
3503    NavigableMap<byte[], List<Cell>> deleteMap = new TreeMap<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
3504    deleteMap.put(fam1, kvs);
3505    region.delete(new Delete(forUnitTestsOnly, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, deleteMap));
3506
3507    // extract the key values out the memstore:
3508    // This is kinda hacky, but better than nothing...
3509    long now = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime();
3510    AbstractMemStore memstore = (AbstractMemStore) region.getStore(fam1).memstore;
3511    Cell firstCell = memstore.getActive().first();
3512    assertTrue(firstCell.getTimestamp() <= now);
3513    now = firstCell.getTimestamp();
3514    for (Cell cell : memstore.getActive().getCellSet()) {
3515      assertTrue(cell.getTimestamp() <= now);
3516      now = cell.getTimestamp();
3517    }
3518  }

3544  @Test
3545  public void testGet_Basic() throws IOException {
3546    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3547    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
3548    byte[] col1 = Bytes.toBytes("col1");
3549    byte[] col2 = Bytes.toBytes("col2");
3550    byte[] col3 = Bytes.toBytes("col3");
3551    byte[] col4 = Bytes.toBytes("col4");
3552    byte[] col5 = Bytes.toBytes("col5");
3553
3554    // Setting up region
3555    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, fam1);
3556    // Add to memstore
3557    Put put = new Put(row1);
3558    put.addColumn(fam1, col1, null);
3559    put.addColumn(fam1, col2, null);
3560    put.addColumn(fam1, col3, null);
3561    put.addColumn(fam1, col4, null);
3562    put.addColumn(fam1, col5, null);
3563    region.put(put);
3564
3565    Get get = new Get(row1);
3566    get.addColumn(fam1, col2);
3567    get.addColumn(fam1, col4);
3568    // Expected result
3569    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col2);
3570    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col4);
3571    KeyValue[] expected = { kv1, kv2 };
3572
3573    // Test
3574    Result res = region.get(get);
3575    assertEquals(expected.length, res.size());
3576    for (int i = 0; i < res.size(); i++) {
3577      assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingRows(expected[i], res.rawCells()[i]));
3578      assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingFamily(expected[i], res.rawCells()[i]));
3579      assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingQualifier(expected[i], res.rawCells()[i]));
3580    }
3581
3582    // Test using a filter on a Get
3583    Get g = new Get(row1);
3584    final int count = 2;
3585    g.setFilter(new ColumnCountGetFilter(count));
3586    res = region.get(g);
3587    assertEquals(count, res.size());
3588  }

3603  @Test
3604  public void testGetWithFilter() throws IOException, InterruptedException {
3605    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3606    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
3607    byte[] col1 = Bytes.toBytes("col1");
3608    byte[] value1 = Bytes.toBytes("value1");
3609    byte[] value2 = Bytes.toBytes("value2");
3610
3611    final int maxVersions = 3;
3612    TableDescriptor tableDescriptor =
3613      TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(TableName.valueOf("testFilterAndColumnTracker"))
3614        .setColumnFamily(
3615          ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(fam1).setMaxVersions(maxVersions).build())
3616        .build();
3617    ChunkCreator.initialize(MemStoreLAB.CHUNK_SIZE_DEFAULT, false, 0, 0, 0, null,
3618      MemStoreLAB.INDEX_CHUNK_SIZE_PERCENTAGE_DEFAULT);
3619    RegionInfo info = RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(tableDescriptor.getTableName()).build();
3620    Path logDir = TEST_UTIL.getDataTestDirOnTestFS(method + ".log");
3621    final WAL wal = HBaseTestingUtil.createWal(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), logDir, info);
3622    this.region = TEST_UTIL.createLocalHRegion(info, CONF, tableDescriptor, wal);
3623
3624    // Put 4 version to memstore
3625    long ts = 0;
3626    Put put = new Put(row1, ts);
3627    put.addColumn(fam1, col1, value1);
3628    region.put(put);
3629    put = new Put(row1, ts + 1);
3630    put.addColumn(fam1, col1, Bytes.toBytes("filter1"));
3631    region.put(put);
3632    put = new Put(row1, ts + 2);
3633    put.addColumn(fam1, col1, Bytes.toBytes("filter2"));
3634    region.put(put);
3635    put = new Put(row1, ts + 3);
3636    put.addColumn(fam1, col1, value2);
3637    region.put(put);
3638
3639    Get get = new Get(row1);
3640    get.readAllVersions();
3641    Result res = region.get(get);
3642    // Get 3 versions, the oldest version has gone from user view
3643    assertEquals(maxVersions, res.size());
3644
3645    get.setFilter(new ValueFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL, new SubstringComparator("value")));
3646    res = region.get(get);
3647    // When use value filter, the oldest version should still gone from user view and it
3648    // should only return one key vaule
3649    assertEquals(1, res.size());
3650    assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingValue(new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col1, value2), res.rawCells()[0]));
3651    assertEquals(ts + 3, res.rawCells()[0].getTimestamp());
3652
3653    region.flush(true);
3654    region.compact(true);
3655    Thread.sleep(1000);
3656    res = region.get(get);
3657    // After flush and compact, the result should be consistent with previous result
3658    assertEquals(1, res.size());
3659    assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingValue(new KeyValue(row1, fam1, col1, value2), res.rawCells()[0]));
3660  }

3688    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3689    Scan scan = new Scan();
3690    scan.addFamily(fam2);
3691    assertThrows(NoSuchColumnFamilyException.class, () -> region.getScanner(scan));

3694  @Test
3695  public void testGetScanner_WithNoFamilies() throws IOException {
3696    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3697    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
3698    byte[] fam2 = Bytes.toBytes("fam2");
3699    byte[] fam3 = Bytes.toBytes("fam3");
3700    byte[] fam4 = Bytes.toBytes("fam4");
3701
3702    byte[][] families = { fam1, fam2, fam3, fam4 };
3703
3704    // Setting up region
3705    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3706    // Putting data in Region
3707    Put put = new Put(row1);
3708    put.addColumn(fam1, null, null);
3709    put.addColumn(fam2, null, null);
3710    put.addColumn(fam3, null, null);
3711    put.addColumn(fam4, null, null);
3712    region.put(put);
3713
3714    Scan scan = null;
3715
3716    // Testing to see how many scanners that is produced by getScanner, starting with known number,
3717    // 2 - current = 1
3718    scan = new Scan();
3719    scan.addFamily(fam2);
3720    scan.addFamily(fam4);
3721    try (RegionScannerImpl is = region.getScanner(scan)) {
3722      assertEquals(1, is.storeHeap.getHeap().size());
3723    }
3724
3725    scan = new Scan();
3726    try (RegionScannerImpl is = region.getScanner(scan)) {
3727      assertEquals(families.length - 1, is.storeHeap.getHeap().size());
3728    }
3729  }

3752  @Test
3753  public void testRegionScanner_Next() throws IOException {
3754    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
3755    byte[] row2 = Bytes.toBytes("row2");
3756    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
3757    byte[] fam2 = Bytes.toBytes("fam2");
3758    byte[] fam3 = Bytes.toBytes("fam3");
3759    byte[] fam4 = Bytes.toBytes("fam4");
3760
3761    byte[][] families = { fam1, fam2, fam3, fam4 };
3762    long ts = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime();
3763
3764    // Setting up region
3765    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
3766    // Putting data in Region
3767    Put put = null;
3768    put = new Put(row1);
3769    put.addColumn(fam1, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3770    put.addColumn(fam2, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3771    put.addColumn(fam3, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3772    put.addColumn(fam4, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3773    region.put(put);
3774
3775    put = new Put(row2);
3776    put.addColumn(fam1, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3777    put.addColumn(fam2, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3778    put.addColumn(fam3, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3779    put.addColumn(fam4, (byte[]) null, ts, null);
3780    region.put(put);
3781
3782    Scan scan = new Scan();
3783    scan.addFamily(fam2);
3784    scan.addFamily(fam4);
3785    try (InternalScanner is = region.getScanner(scan)) {
3786      List<ExtendedCell> res = null;
3787
3788      // Result 1
3789      List<ExtendedCell> expected1 = new ArrayList<>();
3790      expected1.add(new KeyValue(row1, fam2, null, ts, KeyValue.Type.Put, null));
3791      expected1.add(new KeyValue(row1, fam4, null, ts, KeyValue.Type.Put, null));
3792
3793      res = new ArrayList<>();
3794      is.next(res);
3795      for (int i = 0; i < res.size(); i++) {
3796        assertTrue(PrivateCellUtil.equalsIgnoreMvccVersion(expected1.get(i), res.get(i)));
3797      }
3798
3799      // Result 2
3800      List<ExtendedCell> expected2 = new ArrayList<>();
3801      expected2.add(new KeyValue(row2, fam2, null, ts, KeyValue.Type.Put, null));
3802      expected2.add(new KeyValue(row2, fam4, null, ts, KeyValue.Type.Put, null));
3803
3804      res = new ArrayList<>();
3805      is.next(res);
3806      for (int i = 0; i < res.size(); i++) {
3807        assertTrue(PrivateCellUtil.equalsIgnoreMvccVersion(expected2.get(i), res.get(i)));
3808      }
3809    }
3810  }

4243
4244    Put put = new Put(row1);
4245    put.addColumn(cf_essential, col_normal, Bytes.toBytes(1));
4246    put.addColumn(cf_joined, col_alpha, Bytes.toBytes(1));
4247    region.put(put);
4248
4249    put = new Put(row2);
4250    put.addColumn(cf_essential, col_alpha, Bytes.toBytes(2));
4251    put.addColumn(cf_joined, col_normal, Bytes.toBytes(2));
4252    put.addColumn(cf_alpha, col_alpha, Bytes.toBytes(2));
4253    region.put(put);
4254
4255    put = new Put(row3);
4256    put.addColumn(cf_essential, col_normal, filtered_val);
4257    put.addColumn(cf_joined, col_normal, filtered_val);
4258    region.put(put);
4259
4260    // Check two things:
4261    // 1. result list contains expected values
4262    // 2. result list is sorted properly
4263
4264    Scan scan = new Scan();
4265    Filter filter = new SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter(cf_essential, col_normal,
4266      CompareOperator.NOT_EQUAL, filtered_val);
4267    scan.setFilter(filter);
4268    scan.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(true);
4269    try (InternalScanner s = region.getScanner(scan)) {
4270      List<Cell> results = new ArrayList<>();
4271      assertTrue(s.next(results));
4272      assertEquals(1, results.size());
4273      results.clear();
4274
4275      assertTrue(s.next(results));
4276      assertEquals(3, results.size());
4277      assertTrue("orderCheck", CellUtil.matchingFamily(results.get(0), cf_alpha));
4278      assertTrue("orderCheck", CellUtil.matchingFamily(results.get(1), cf_essential));
4279      assertTrue("orderCheck", CellUtil.matchingFamily(results.get(2), cf_joined));
4280      results.clear();
4281
4282      assertFalse(s.next(results));
4283      assertEquals(0, results.size());
4284    }
4285  }

4287  /**
4288   * HBASE-5416 Test case when scan limits amount of KVs returned on each next() call.
4289   */
4290  @Test
4291  public void testScanner_JoinedScannersWithLimits() throws IOException {
4292    final byte[] cf_first = Bytes.toBytes("first");
4293    final byte[] cf_second = Bytes.toBytes("second");
4294
4295    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, cf_first, cf_second);
4296    final byte[] col_a = Bytes.toBytes("a");
4297    final byte[] col_b = Bytes.toBytes("b");
4298
4299    Put put;
4300
4301    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
4302      put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("r" + Integer.toString(i)));
4303      put.addColumn(cf_first, col_a, Bytes.toBytes(i));
4304      if (i < 5) {
4305        put.addColumn(cf_first, col_b, Bytes.toBytes(i));
4306        put.addColumn(cf_second, col_a, Bytes.toBytes(i));
4307        put.addColumn(cf_second, col_b, Bytes.toBytes(i));
4308      }
4309      region.put(put);
4310    }
4311
4312    Scan scan = new Scan();
4313    scan.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(true);
4314    Filter bogusFilter = new FilterBase() {
4315      @Override
4316      public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell ignored) throws IOException {
4317        return ReturnCode.INCLUDE;
4318      }
4319
4320      @Override
4321      public boolean isFamilyEssential(byte[] name) {
4322        return Bytes.equals(name, cf_first);
4323      }
4324    };
4325
4326    scan.setFilter(bogusFilter);
4327    try (InternalScanner s = region.getScanner(scan)) {
4328      // Our data looks like this:
4329      // r0: first:a, first:b, second:a, second:b
4330      // r1: first:a, first:b, second:a, second:b
4331      // r2: first:a, first:b, second:a, second:b
4332      // r3: first:a, first:b, second:a, second:b
4333      // r4: first:a, first:b, second:a, second:b
4334      // r5: first:a
4335      // r6: first:a
4336      // r7: first:a
4337      // r8: first:a
4338      // r9: first:a
4339
4340      // But due to next's limit set to 3, we should get this:
4341      // r0: first:a, first:b, second:a
4342      // r0: second:b
4343      // r1: first:a, first:b, second:a
4344      // r1: second:b
4345      // r2: first:a, first:b, second:a
4346      // r2: second:b
4347      // r3: first:a, first:b, second:a
4348      // r3: second:b
4349      // r4: first:a, first:b, second:a
4350      // r4: second:b
4351      // r5: first:a
4352      // r6: first:a
4353      // r7: first:a
4354      // r8: first:a
4355      // r9: first:a
4356
4357      List<Cell> results = new ArrayList<>();
4358      int index = 0;
4359      ScannerContext scannerContext = ScannerContext.newBuilder().setBatchLimit(3).build();
4360      while (true) {
4361        boolean more = s.next(results, scannerContext);
4362        if ((index >> 1) < 5) {
4363          if (index % 2 == 0) {
4364            assertEquals(3, results.size());
4365          } else {
4366            assertEquals(1, results.size());
4367          }
4368        } else {
4369          assertEquals(1, results.size());
4370        }
4371        results.clear();
4372        index++;
4373        if (!more) {
4374          break;
4375        }
4376      }
4377    }
4378  }

4400   */
4401  @Test
4402  public void testLongQualifier() throws Exception {

4407    for (byte i = 0; i < 10; i++) {

4417  /**
4418   * Flushes the cache in a thread while scanning. The tests verify that the scan is coherent - e.g.
4419   * the returned results are always of the same or later update as the previous results. scan /
4420   * compact thread join
4421   */
4422  @Test
4423  public void testFlushCacheWhileScanning() throws IOException, InterruptedException {
4424    byte[] family = Bytes.toBytes("family");
4425    int numRows = 1000;
4426    int flushAndScanInterval = 10;
4427    int compactInterval = 10 * flushAndScanInterval;
4428
4429    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, family);
4430    FlushThread flushThread = new FlushThread();
4431    try {
4432      flushThread.start();
4433
4434      Scan scan = new Scan();
4435      scan.addFamily(family);
4436      scan.setFilter(new SingleColumnValueFilter(family, qual1, CompareOperator.EQUAL,
4437        new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes(5L))));
4438
4439      int expectedCount = 0;
4440      List<Cell> res = new ArrayList<>();
4441
4442      boolean toggle = true;
4443      for (long i = 0; i < numRows; i++) {
4444        Put put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes(i));
4445        put.setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL);
4446        put.addColumn(family, qual1, Bytes.toBytes(i % 10));
4447        region.put(put);
4448
4449        if (i != 0 && i % compactInterval == 0) {
4450          LOG.debug("iteration = " + i + " ts=" + EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
4451          region.compact(true);
4452        }
4453
4454        if (i % 10 == 5L) {
4455          expectedCount++;
4456        }
4457
4458        if (i != 0 && i % flushAndScanInterval == 0) {
4459          res.clear();
4460          try (InternalScanner scanner = region.getScanner(scan)) {
4461            if (toggle) {
4462              flushThread.flush();
4463            }
4464            while (scanner.next(res)) {
4465              // ignore
4466            }
4467          }
4468          if (!toggle) {
4469            flushThread.flush();
4470          }
4471          assertEquals(
4472            "toggle=" + toggle + "i=" + i + " ts=" + EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime(),
4473            expectedCount, res.size());
4474          toggle = !toggle;
4475        }
4476      }
4477
4478    } finally {
4479      try {
4480        flushThread.done();
4481        flushThread.join();
4482        flushThread.checkNoError();
4483      } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
4484        LOG.warn("Caught exception when joining with flushThread", ie);
4485      }
4486      HBaseTestingUtil.closeRegionAndWAL(this.region);
4487      this.region = null;
4488    }
4489  }
4490
4491  protected class FlushThread extends Thread {
4492    private volatile boolean done;
4493    private Throwable error = null;
4494
4495    FlushThread() {
4496      super("FlushThread");
4497    }
4498
4499    public void done() {
4500      done = true;
4501      synchronized (this) {
4502        interrupt();
4503      }
4504    }
4505
4506    public void checkNoError() {
4507      if (error != null) {
4508        assertNull(error);
4509      }
4510    }
4511
4512    @Override
4513    public void run() {
4514      done = false;
4515      while (!done) {
4516        synchronized (this) {
4517          try {
4518            wait();
4519          } catch (InterruptedException ignored) {
4520            if (done) {
4521              break;
4522            }
4523          }
4524        }
4525        try {
4526          region.flush(true);
4527        } catch (IOException e) {
4528          if (!done) {
4529            LOG.error("Error while flushing cache", e);
4530            error = e;
4531          }
4532          break;
4533        } catch (Throwable t) {
4534          LOG.error("Uncaught exception", t);
4535          throw t;
4536        }
4537      }
4538    }
4539
4540    public void flush() {
4541      synchronized (this) {
4542        notify();
4543      }
4544    }
4545  }
4546
4547  /**
4548   * So can be overridden in subclasses.
4549   */
4550  protected int getNumQualifiersForTestWritesWhileScanning() {
4551    return 100;
4552  }
4553
4554  /**
4555   * So can be overridden in subclasses.
4556   */
4557  protected int getTestCountForTestWritesWhileScanning() {
4558    return 100;
4559  }
4560
4561  /**
4562   * Writes very wide records and scans for the latest every time.. Flushes and compacts the region
4563   * every now and then to keep things realistic. by flush / scan / compaction when joining threads
4564   */
4565  @Test
4566  public void testWritesWhileScanning() throws IOException, InterruptedException {
4567    int testCount = getTestCountForTestWritesWhileScanning();
4568    int numRows = 1;
4569    int numFamilies = 10;
4570    int numQualifiers = getNumQualifiersForTestWritesWhileScanning();
4571    int flushInterval = 7;
4572    int compactInterval = 5 * flushInterval;
4573    byte[][] families = new byte[numFamilies][];
4574    for (int i = 0; i < numFamilies; i++) {
4575      families[i] = Bytes.toBytes("family" + i);
4576    }
4577    byte[][] qualifiers = new byte[numQualifiers][];
4578    for (int i = 0; i < numQualifiers; i++) {
4579      qualifiers[i] = Bytes.toBytes("qual" + i);
4580    }
4581
4582    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, families);
4583    FlushThread flushThread = new FlushThread();
4584    PutThread putThread = new PutThread(numRows, families, qualifiers);
4585    try {
4586      putThread.start();
4587      putThread.waitForFirstPut();
4588
4589      flushThread.start();
4590
4591      Scan scan = new Scan().withStartRow(Bytes.toBytes("row0")).withStopRow(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
4592
4593      int expectedCount = numFamilies * numQualifiers;
4594      List<Cell> res = new ArrayList<>();
4595
4596      long prevTimestamp = 0L;
4597      for (int i = 0; i < testCount; i++) {
4598
4599        if (i != 0 && i % compactInterval == 0) {
4600          region.compact(true);
4601          for (HStore store : region.getStores()) {
4602            store.closeAndArchiveCompactedFiles();
4603          }
4604        }
4605
4606        if (i != 0 && i % flushInterval == 0) {
4607          flushThread.flush();
4608        }
4609
4610        boolean previousEmpty = res.isEmpty();
4611        res.clear();
4612        try (InternalScanner scanner = region.getScanner(scan)) {
4613          boolean moreRows;
4614          do {
4615            moreRows = scanner.next(res);
4616          } while (moreRows);
4617        }
4618        if (!res.isEmpty() || !previousEmpty || i > compactInterval) {
4619          assertEquals("i=" + i, expectedCount, res.size());
4620          long timestamp = res.get(0).getTimestamp();
4621          assertTrue("Timestamps were broke: " + timestamp + " prev: " + prevTimestamp,
4622            timestamp >= prevTimestamp);
4623          prevTimestamp = timestamp;
4624        }
4625      }
4626
4627      putThread.done();
4628
4629      region.flush(true);
4630
4631    } finally {
4632      try {
4633        flushThread.done();
4634        flushThread.join();
4635        flushThread.checkNoError();
4636
4637        putThread.join();
4638        putThread.checkNoError();
4639      } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
4640        LOG.warn("Caught exception when joining with flushThread", ie);
4641      }
4642
4643      try {
4644        HBaseTestingUtil.closeRegionAndWAL(this.region);
4645      } catch (DroppedSnapshotException dse) {
4646        // We could get this on way out because we interrupt the background flusher and it could
4647        // fail anywhere causing a DSE over in the background flusher... only it is not properly
4648        // dealt with so could still be memory hanging out when we get to here -- memory we can't
4649        // flush because the accounting is 'off' since original DSE.
4650      }
4651      this.region = null;
4652    }
4653  }
4654
4655  @Test
4656  public void testCloseAndArchiveCompactedFiles() throws IOException {
4657    byte[] CF1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
4658    byte[] CF2 = Bytes.toBytes("CF2");
4659    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, CF1, CF2);
4660    for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
4661      int index = i;
4662      Put put =
4663        new Put(Bytes.toBytes(index)).addColumn(CF1, Bytes.toBytes("q"), Bytes.toBytes(index));
4664      region.put(put);
4665      region.flush(true);
4666    }
4667
4668    region.compact(true);
4669
4670    HStore store1 = region.getStore(CF1);
4671    HStore store2 = region.getStore(CF2);
4672    store1.closeAndArchiveCompactedFiles();
4673    store2.closeAndArchiveCompactedFiles();
4674
4675    int storefilesCount = region.getStores().stream().mapToInt(Store::getStorefilesCount).sum();
4676    assertTrue(storefilesCount == 1);
4677
4678    FileSystem fs = region.getRegionFileSystem().getFileSystem();
4679    Configuration conf = region.getReadOnlyConfiguration();
4680    RegionInfo regionInfo = region.getRegionInfo();
4681    Path store1ArchiveDir = HFileArchiveUtil.getStoreArchivePath(conf, regionInfo, CF1);
4682    assertTrue(fs.exists(store1ArchiveDir));
4683    // The archived dir of CF2 does not exist because this column family has no data at all
4684    Path store2ArchiveDir = HFileArchiveUtil.getStoreArchivePath(conf, regionInfo, CF2);
4685    assertFalse(fs.exists(store2ArchiveDir));
4686  }
4687
4688  protected class PutThread extends Thread {
4689    private volatile boolean done;
4690    private volatile int numPutsFinished = 0;
4691
4692    private Throwable error = null;
4693    private int numRows;
4694    private byte[][] families;
4695    private byte[][] qualifiers;
4696
4697    private PutThread(int numRows, byte[][] families, byte[][] qualifiers) {
4698      super("PutThread");
4699      this.numRows = numRows;
4700      this.families = families;
4701      this.qualifiers = qualifiers;
4702    }
4703
4704    /**
4705     * Block calling thread until this instance of PutThread has put at least one row.
4706     */
4707    public void waitForFirstPut() throws InterruptedException {
4708      // wait until put thread actually puts some data
4709      while (isAlive() && numPutsFinished == 0) {
4710        checkNoError();
4711        Thread.sleep(50);
4712      }
4713    }
4714
4715    public void done() {
4716      done = true;
4717      synchronized (this) {
4718        interrupt();
4719      }
4720    }
4721
4722    public void checkNoError() {
4723      if (error != null) {
4724        assertNull(error);
4725      }
4726    }
4727
4728    @Override
4729    public void run() {
4730      done = false;
4731      while (!done) {
4732        try {
4733          for (int r = 0; r < numRows; r++) {
4734            byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("row" + r);
4735            Put put = new Put(row);
4736            put.setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL);
4737            byte[] value = Bytes.toBytes(String.valueOf(numPutsFinished));
4738            for (byte[] family : families) {
4739              for (byte[] qualifier : qualifiers) {
4740                put.addColumn(family, qualifier, numPutsFinished, value);
4741              }
4742            }
4743            region.put(put);
4744            numPutsFinished++;
4745            if (numPutsFinished > 0 && numPutsFinished % 47 == 0) {
4746              LOG.debug("put iteration = {}", numPutsFinished);
4747              Delete delete = new Delete(row, (long) numPutsFinished - 30);
4748              region.delete(delete);
4749            }
4750            numPutsFinished++;
4751          }
4752        } catch (InterruptedIOException e) {
4753          // This is fine. It means we are done, or didn't get the lock on time
4754          LOG.info("Interrupted", e);
4755        } catch (IOException e) {
4756          LOG.error("Error while putting records", e);
4757          error = e;
4758          break;
4759        }
4760      }
4761
4762    }
4763
4764  }
4765
4766  /**
4767   * Writes very wide records and gets the latest row every time.. Flushes and compacts the region
4768   * aggressivly to catch issues. by flush / scan / compaction when joining threads
4769   */
4770  @Test
4771  public void testWritesWhileGetting() throws Exception {
4772    int testCount = 50;
4773    int numRows = 1;
4774    int numFamilies = 10;
4775    int numQualifiers = 100;
4776    int compactInterval = 100;
4777    byte[][] families = new byte[numFamilies][];
4778    for (int i = 0; i < numFamilies; i++) {
4779      families[i] = Bytes.toBytes("family" + i);
4780    }
4781    byte[][] qualifiers = new byte[numQualifiers][];
4782    for (int i = 0; i < numQualifiers; i++) {
4783      qualifiers[i] = Bytes.toBytes("qual" + i);
4784    }
4785
4786    // This test flushes constantly and can cause many files to be created,
4787    // possibly
4788    // extending over the ulimit. Make sure compactions are aggressive in
4789    // reducing
4790    // the number of HFiles created.
4791    Configuration conf = HBaseConfiguration.create(CONF);
4792    conf.setInt("hbase.hstore.compaction.min", 1);
4793    conf.setInt("hbase.hstore.compaction.max", 1000);
4794    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
4795    PutThread putThread = null;
4796    MultithreadedTestUtil.TestContext ctx = new MultithreadedTestUtil.TestContext(conf);
4797    try {
4798      putThread = new PutThread(numRows, families, qualifiers);
4799      putThread.start();
4800      putThread.waitForFirstPut();
4801
4802      // Add a thread that flushes as fast as possible
4803      ctx.addThread(new RepeatingTestThread(ctx) {
4804
4805        @Override
4806        public void doAnAction() throws Exception {
4807          region.flush(true);
4808          // Compact regularly to avoid creating too many files and exceeding
4809          // the ulimit.
4810          region.compact(false);
4811          for (HStore store : region.getStores()) {
4812            store.closeAndArchiveCompactedFiles();
4813          }
4814        }
4815      });
4816      ctx.startThreads();
4817
4818      Get get = new Get(Bytes.toBytes("row0"));
4819      Result result = null;
4820
4821      int expectedCount = numFamilies * numQualifiers;
4822
4823      long prevTimestamp = 0L;
4824      for (int i = 0; i < testCount; i++) {
4825        LOG.info("testWritesWhileGetting verify turn " + i);
4826        boolean previousEmpty = result == null || result.isEmpty();
4827        result = region.get(get);
4828        if (!result.isEmpty() || !previousEmpty || i > compactInterval) {
4829          assertEquals("i=" + i, expectedCount, result.size());
4830          // TODO this was removed, now what dangit?!
4831          // search looking for the qualifier in question?
4832          long timestamp = 0;
4833          for (Cell kv : result.rawCells()) {
4834            if (
4835              CellUtil.matchingFamily(kv, families[0])
4836                && CellUtil.matchingQualifier(kv, qualifiers[0])
4837            ) {
4838              timestamp = kv.getTimestamp();
4839            }
4840          }
4841          assertTrue(timestamp >= prevTimestamp);
4842          prevTimestamp = timestamp;
4843          ExtendedCell previousKV = null;
4844
4845          for (ExtendedCell kv : ClientInternalHelper.getExtendedRawCells(result)) {
4846            byte[] thisValue = CellUtil.cloneValue(kv);
4847            if (previousKV != null) {
4848              if (Bytes.compareTo(CellUtil.cloneValue(previousKV), thisValue) != 0) {
4849                LOG.warn("These two KV should have the same value." + " Previous KV:" + previousKV
4850                  + "(memStoreTS:" + previousKV.getSequenceId() + ")" + ", New KV: " + kv
4851                  + "(memStoreTS:" + kv.getSequenceId() + ")");
4852                assertEquals(0, Bytes.compareTo(CellUtil.cloneValue(previousKV), thisValue));
4853              }
4854            }
4855            previousKV = kv;
4856          }
4857        }
4858      }
4859    } finally {
4860      if (putThread != null) putThread.done();
4861
4862      region.flush(true);
4863
4864      if (putThread != null) {
4865        putThread.join();
4866        putThread.checkNoError();
4867      }
4868
4869      ctx.stop();
4870      HBaseTestingUtil.closeRegionAndWAL(this.region);
4871      this.region = null;
4872    }
4873  }

4893  @Test
4894  public void testIndexesScanWithOneDeletedRow() throws IOException {
4895    byte[] family = Bytes.toBytes("family");
4896
4897    // Setting up region
4898    this.region = initHRegion(tableName, method, CONF, family);
4899    Put put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes(1L));
4900    put.addColumn(family, qual1, 1L, Bytes.toBytes(1L));
4901    region.put(put);
4902
4903    region.flush(true);
4904
4905    Delete delete = new Delete(Bytes.toBytes(1L), 1L);
4906    region.delete(delete);
4907
4908    put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes(2L));
4909    put.addColumn(family, qual1, 2L, Bytes.toBytes(2L));
4910    region.put(put);
4911
4912    Scan idxScan = new Scan();
4913    idxScan.addFamily(family);
4914    idxScan.setFilter(new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
4915      Arrays.<Filter> asList(
4916        new SingleColumnValueFilter(family, qual1, CompareOperator.GREATER_OR_EQUAL,
4917          new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes(0L))),
4918        new SingleColumnValueFilter(family, qual1, CompareOperator.LESS_OR_EQUAL,
4919          new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes(3L))))));
4920    try (InternalScanner scanner = region.getScanner(idxScan)) {
4921      List<Cell> res = new ArrayList<>();
4922
4923      while (scanner.next(res)) {
4924        // Ignore res value.
4925      }
4926      assertEquals(1L, res.size());
4927    }
4928  }

4930  // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4931  // Bloom filter test
4932  // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4933  @Test
4934  public void testBloomFilterSize() throws IOException {
4935    byte[] fam1 = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
4936    byte[] qf1 = Bytes.toBytes("col");
4937    byte[] val1 = Bytes.toBytes("value1");
4938    // Create Table
4939    TableDescriptor tableDescriptor = TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(tableName)
4940      .setColumnFamily(ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(fam1)
4941        .setMaxVersions(Integer.MAX_VALUE).setBloomFilterType(BloomType.ROWCOL).build())
4942      .build();
4943    RegionInfo info = RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(tableDescriptor.getTableName()).build();
4944    this.region = TEST_UTIL.createLocalHRegion(info, tableDescriptor);
4945    int num_unique_rows = 10;
4946    int duplicate_multiplier = 2;
4947    int num_storefiles = 4;
4948
4949    int version = 0;
4950    for (int f = 0; f < num_storefiles; f++) {
4951      for (int i = 0; i < duplicate_multiplier; i++) {
4952        for (int j = 0; j < num_unique_rows; j++) {
4953          Put put = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row" + j));
4954          put.setDurability(Durability.SKIP_WAL);
4955          long ts = version++;
4956          put.addColumn(fam1, qf1, ts, val1);
4957          region.put(put);
4958        }
4959      }
4960      region.flush(true);
4961    }
4962    // before compaction
4963    HStore store = region.getStore(fam1);
4964    Collection<HStoreFile> storeFiles = store.getStorefiles();
4965    for (HStoreFile storefile : storeFiles) {
4966      StoreFileReader reader = storefile.getReader();
4967      reader.loadFileInfo();
4968      reader.loadBloomfilter();
4969      assertEquals(num_unique_rows * duplicate_multiplier, reader.getEntries());
4970      assertEquals(num_unique_rows, reader.getFilterEntries());
4971    }
4972
4973    region.compact(true);
4974
4975    // after compaction
4976    storeFiles = store.getStorefiles();
4977    for (HStoreFile storefile : storeFiles) {
4978      StoreFileReader reader = storefile.getReader();
4979      reader.loadFileInfo();
4980      reader.loadBloomfilter();
4981      assertEquals(num_unique_rows * duplicate_multiplier * num_storefiles, reader.getEntries());
4982      assertEquals(num_unique_rows, reader.getFilterEntries());
4983    }
4984  }

5060  @Test
5061  public void testgetHDFSBlocksDistribution() throws Exception {
5062    HBaseTestingUtil htu = new HBaseTestingUtil();
5063    // Why do we set the block size in this test? If we set it smaller than the kvs, then we'll
5064    // break up the file in to more pieces that can be distributed across the three nodes and we
5065    // won't be able to have the condition this test asserts; that at least one node has
5066    // a copy of all replicas -- if small block size, then blocks are spread evenly across the
5067    // the three nodes. hfilev3 with tags seems to put us over the block size. St.Ack.
5068    // final int DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE = 1024;
5069    // htu.getConfiguration().setLong("dfs.blocksize", DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE);
5070    htu.getConfiguration().setInt("dfs.replication", 2);
5071
5072    // set up a cluster with 3 nodes
5073    SingleProcessHBaseCluster cluster = null;
5074    String dataNodeHosts[] = new String[] { "host1", "host2", "host3" };
5075    int regionServersCount = 3;
5076
5077    try {
5078      StartTestingClusterOption option = StartTestingClusterOption.builder()
5079        .numRegionServers(regionServersCount).dataNodeHosts(dataNodeHosts).build();
5080      cluster = htu.startMiniCluster(option);
5081      byte[][] families = { fam1, fam2 };
5082      Table ht = htu.createTable(tableName, families);
5083
5084      // Setting up region
5085      byte row[] = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
5086      byte col[] = Bytes.toBytes("col1");
5087
5088      Put put = new Put(row);
5089      put.addColumn(fam1, col, 1, Bytes.toBytes("test1"));
5090      put.addColumn(fam2, col, 1, Bytes.toBytes("test2"));
5091      ht.put(put);
5092
5093      HRegion firstRegion = htu.getHBaseCluster().getRegions(tableName).get(0);
5094      firstRegion.flush(true);
5095      HDFSBlocksDistribution blocksDistribution1 = firstRegion.getHDFSBlocksDistribution();
5096
5097      // Given the default replication factor is 2 and we have 2 HFiles,
5098      // we will have total of 4 replica of blocks on 3 datanodes; thus there
5099      // must be at least one host that have replica for 2 HFiles. That host's
5100      // weight will be equal to the unique block weight.
5101      long uniqueBlocksWeight1 = blocksDistribution1.getUniqueBlocksTotalWeight();
5102      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
5103      for (String host : blocksDistribution1.getTopHosts()) {
5104        if (sb.length() > 0) sb.append(", ");
5105        sb.append(host);
5106        sb.append("=");
5107        sb.append(blocksDistribution1.getWeight(host));
5108      }
5109
5110      String topHost = blocksDistribution1.getTopHosts().get(0);
5111      long topHostWeight = blocksDistribution1.getWeight(topHost);
5112      String msg = "uniqueBlocksWeight=" + uniqueBlocksWeight1 + ", topHostWeight=" + topHostWeight
5113        + ", topHost=" + topHost + "; " + sb.toString();
5114      LOG.info(msg);
5115      assertTrue(msg, uniqueBlocksWeight1 == topHostWeight);
5116
5117      // use the static method to compute the value, it should be the same.
5118      // static method is used by load balancer or other components
5119      HDFSBlocksDistribution blocksDistribution2 = HRegion.computeHDFSBlocksDistribution(
5120        htu.getConfiguration(), firstRegion.getTableDescriptor(), firstRegion.getRegionInfo());
5121      long uniqueBlocksWeight2 = blocksDistribution2.getUniqueBlocksTotalWeight();
5122
5123      assertTrue(uniqueBlocksWeight1 == uniqueBlocksWeight2);
5124
5125      ht.close();
5126    } finally {
5127      if (cluster != null) {
5128        htu.shutdownMiniCluster();
5129      }
5130    }
5131  }

5133  /**
5134   * Testcase to check state of region initialization task set to ABORTED or not if any exceptions
5135   * during initialization
5136   */
5137  @Test
5138  public void testStatusSettingToAbortIfAnyExceptionDuringRegionInitilization() throws Exception {
5139    RegionInfo info;
5140    try {
5141      FileSystem fs = mock(FileSystem.class);
5142      when(fs.exists(any())).thenThrow(new IOException());
5143      TableDescriptorBuilder tableDescriptorBuilder = TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(tableName);
5144      ColumnFamilyDescriptor columnFamilyDescriptor =
5145        ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(Bytes.toBytes("cf")).build();
5146      tableDescriptorBuilder.setColumnFamily(columnFamilyDescriptor);
5147      info = RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(tableName).build();
5148      Path path = new Path(dir + "testStatusSettingToAbortIfAnyExceptionDuringRegionInitilization");
5149      region = HRegion.newHRegion(path, null, fs, CONF, info, tableDescriptorBuilder.build(), null);
5150      // region initialization throws IOException and set task state to ABORTED.
5151      region.initialize();
5152      fail("Region initialization should fail due to IOException");
5153    } catch (IOException io) {
5154      List<MonitoredTask> tasks = TaskMonitor.get().getTasks();
5155      for (MonitoredTask monitoredTask : tasks) {
5156        if (
5157          !(monitoredTask instanceof MonitoredRPCHandler)
5158            && monitoredTask.getDescription().contains(region.toString())
5159        ) {
5160          assertTrue("Region state should be ABORTED.",
5161            monitoredTask.getState().equals(MonitoredTask.State.ABORTED));
5162          break;
5163        }
5164      }
5165    }
5166  }
