7610  @Test
7611  public void testCloseNoInterrupt() throws Exception {
7612    byte[] cf1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
7613    byte[][] families = { cf1 };
7614    final int SLEEP_TIME = 10 * 1000;
7615
7616    Configuration conf = new Configuration(CONF);
7617    // Disable close thread interrupt and server abort behavior
7618    conf.setBoolean(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_ABORT, false);
7619    conf.setInt(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_INTERVAL, 1000);
7620    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
7621
7622    final CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
7623    final AtomicBoolean holderInterrupted = new AtomicBoolean();
7624    Thread holder = new Thread(new Runnable() {
7625      @Override
7626      public void run() {
7627        try {
7628          LOG.info("Starting region operation holder");
7629          region.startRegionOperation(Operation.SCAN);
7630          latch.countDown();
7631          try {
7632            Thread.sleep(SLEEP_TIME);
7633          } catch (InterruptedException e) {
7634            LOG.info("Interrupted");
7635            holderInterrupted.set(true);
7636          }
7637        } catch (Exception e) {
7638          throw new RuntimeException(e);
7639        } finally {
7640          try {
7641            region.closeRegionOperation();
7642          } catch (IOException e) {
7643          }
7644          LOG.info("Stopped region operation holder");
7645        }
7646      }
7647    });
7648
7649    holder.start();
7650    latch.await();
7651    HBaseTestingUtil.closeRegionAndWAL(region);
7652    region = null;
7653    holder.join();
7654
7655    assertFalse("Region lock holder should not have been interrupted", holderInterrupted.get());
7656  }

7658  @Test
7659  public void testCloseInterrupt() throws Exception {
7660    byte[] cf1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
7661    byte[][] families = { cf1 };
7662    final int SLEEP_TIME = 10 * 1000;
7663
7664    Configuration conf = new Configuration(CONF);
7665    // Enable close thread interrupt and server abort behavior
7666    conf.setBoolean(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_ABORT, true);
7667    // Speed up the unit test, no need to wait default 10 seconds.
7668    conf.setInt(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_INTERVAL, 1000);
7669    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
7670
7671    final CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
7672    final AtomicBoolean holderInterrupted = new AtomicBoolean();
7673    Thread holder = new Thread(new Runnable() {
7674      @Override
7675      public void run() {
7676        try {
7677          LOG.info("Starting region operation holder");
7678          region.startRegionOperation(Operation.SCAN);
7679          latch.countDown();
7680          try {
7681            Thread.sleep(SLEEP_TIME);
7682          } catch (InterruptedException e) {
7683            LOG.info("Interrupted");
7684            holderInterrupted.set(true);
7685          }
7686        } catch (Exception e) {
7687          throw new RuntimeException(e);
7688        } finally {
7689          try {
7690            region.closeRegionOperation();
7691          } catch (IOException e) {
7692          }
7693          LOG.info("Stopped region operation holder");
7694        }
7695      }
7696    });
7697
7698    holder.start();
7699    latch.await();
7700    region.close();
7701    region = null;
7702    holder.join();
7703
7704    assertTrue("Region lock holder was not interrupted", holderInterrupted.get());
7705  }

7707  @Test
7708  public void testCloseAbort() throws Exception {
7709    byte[] cf1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
7710    byte[][] families = { cf1 };
7711    final int SLEEP_TIME = 10 * 1000;
7712
7713    Configuration conf = new Configuration(CONF);
7714    // Enable close thread interrupt and server abort behavior.
7715    conf.setBoolean(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_ABORT, true);
7716    // Set the abort interval to a fraction of sleep time so we are guaranteed to be aborted.
7717    conf.setInt(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_TIME, SLEEP_TIME / 2);
7718    // Set the wait interval to a fraction of sleep time so we are guaranteed to be interrupted.
7719    conf.setInt(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_INTERVAL, SLEEP_TIME / 4);
7720    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
7721    RegionServerServices rsServices = mock(RegionServerServices.class);
7722    when(rsServices.getServerName()).thenReturn(ServerName.valueOf("localhost", 1000, 1000));
7723    region.rsServices = rsServices;
7724
7725    final CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
7726    Thread holder = new Thread(new Runnable() {
7727      @Override
7728      public void run() {
7729        try {
7730          LOG.info("Starting region operation holder");
7731          region.startRegionOperation(Operation.SCAN);
7732          latch.countDown();
7733          // Hold the lock for SLEEP_TIME seconds no matter how many times we are interrupted.
7734          int timeRemaining = SLEEP_TIME;
7735          while (timeRemaining > 0) {
7736            long start = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime();
7737            try {
7738              Thread.sleep(timeRemaining);
7739            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
7740              LOG.info("Interrupted");
7741            }
7742            long end = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime();
7743            timeRemaining -= end - start;
7744            if (timeRemaining < 0) {
7745              timeRemaining = 0;
7746            }
7747            if (timeRemaining > 0) {
7748              LOG.info("Sleeping again, remaining time " + timeRemaining + " ms");
7749            }
7750          }
7751        } catch (Exception e) {
7752          throw new RuntimeException(e);
7753        } finally {
7754          try {
7755            region.closeRegionOperation();
7756          } catch (IOException e) {
7757          }
7758          LOG.info("Stopped region operation holder");
7759        }
7760      }
7761    });
7762
7763    holder.start();
7764    latch.await();
7765    assertThrows(IOException.class, () -> region.close());
7766    holder.join();
7767
7768    // Verify the region tried to abort the server
7769    verify(rsServices, atLeast(1)).abort(anyString(), any());
7770  }
7771
7772  @Test
7773  public void testInterruptProtection() throws Exception {
7774    byte[] cf1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
7775    byte[][] families = { cf1 };
7776    final int SLEEP_TIME = 10 * 1000;
7777
7778    Configuration conf = new Configuration(CONF);
7779    // Enable close thread interrupt and server abort behavior.
7780    conf.setBoolean(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_ABORT, true);
7781    conf.setInt(HRegion.CLOSE_WAIT_INTERVAL, 1000);
7782    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
7783
7784    final CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
7785    final AtomicBoolean holderInterrupted = new AtomicBoolean();
7786    Thread holder = new Thread(new Runnable() {
7787      @Override
7788      public void run() {
7789        try {
7790          LOG.info("Starting region operation holder");
7791          region.startRegionOperation(Operation.SCAN);
7792          LOG.info("Protecting against interrupts");
7793          region.disableInterrupts();
7794          try {
7795            latch.countDown();
7796            try {
7797              Thread.sleep(SLEEP_TIME);
7798            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
7799              LOG.info("Interrupted");
7800              holderInterrupted.set(true);
7801            }
7802          } finally {
7803            region.enableInterrupts();
7804          }
7805        } catch (Exception e) {
7806          throw new RuntimeException(e);
7807        } finally {
7808          try {
7809            region.closeRegionOperation();
7810          } catch (IOException e) {
7811          }
7812          LOG.info("Stopped region operation holder");
7813        }
7814      }
7815    });
7816
7817    holder.start();
7818    latch.await();
7819    region.close();
7820    region = null;
7821    holder.join();
7822
7823    assertFalse("Region lock holder should not have been interrupted", holderInterrupted.get());
7824  }

7826  @Test
7827  public void testRegionOnCoprocessorsChange() throws IOException {
7828    byte[] cf1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
7829    byte[][] families = { cf1 };
7830
7831    Configuration conf = new Configuration(CONF);
7832    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
7833    assertNull(region.getCoprocessorHost());
7834
7835    // set and verify the system coprocessors for region and user region
7836    Configuration newConf = new Configuration(conf);
7837    newConf.set(CoprocessorHost.REGION_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY, MetaTableMetrics.class.getName());
7838    newConf.set(CoprocessorHost.USER_REGION_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY,
7839      NoOpRegionCoprocessor.class.getName());
7840    // trigger configuration change
7841    region.onConfigurationChange(newConf);
7842    assertTrue(region.getCoprocessorHost() != null);
7843    Set<String> coprocessors = region.getCoprocessorHost().getCoprocessors();
7844    assertTrue(coprocessors.size() == 2);
7845    assertTrue(region.getCoprocessorHost().getCoprocessors()
7846      .contains(MetaTableMetrics.class.getSimpleName()));
7847    assertTrue(region.getCoprocessorHost().getCoprocessors()
7848      .contains(NoOpRegionCoprocessor.class.getSimpleName()));
7849
7850    // remove region coprocessor and keep only user region coprocessor
7851    newConf.unset(CoprocessorHost.REGION_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY);
7852    region.onConfigurationChange(newConf);
7853    assertTrue(region.getCoprocessorHost() != null);
7854    coprocessors = region.getCoprocessorHost().getCoprocessors();
7855    assertTrue(coprocessors.size() == 1);
7856    assertTrue(region.getCoprocessorHost().getCoprocessors()
7857      .contains(NoOpRegionCoprocessor.class.getSimpleName()));
7858  }

7860  @Test
7861  public void testRegionOnCoprocessorsWithoutChange() throws IOException {
7862    byte[] cf1 = Bytes.toBytes("CF1");
7863    byte[][] families = { cf1 };
7864
7865    Configuration conf = new Configuration(CONF);
7866    conf.set(CoprocessorHost.REGION_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY,
7867      MetaTableMetrics.class.getCanonicalName());
7868    region = initHRegion(tableName, method, conf, families);
7869    // region service is null in unit test, we need to load the coprocessor once
7870    region.setCoprocessorHost(new RegionCoprocessorHost(region, null, conf));
7871    RegionCoprocessor regionCoprocessor =
7872      region.getCoprocessorHost().findCoprocessor(MetaTableMetrics.class.getName());
7873
7874    // simulate when other configuration may have changed and onConfigurationChange execute once
7875    region.onConfigurationChange(conf);
7876    RegionCoprocessor regionCoprocessorAfterOnConfigurationChange =
7877      region.getCoprocessorHost().findCoprocessor(MetaTableMetrics.class.getName());
7878    assertEquals(regionCoprocessor, regionCoprocessorAfterOnConfigurationChange);
7879  }
